content.query:
-- Create Calendar external table from calendar csv file

use nyc_taxi_ldw;
IF NOT EXISTS (select * from sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'calendar')
 
 CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar (
	[date_key] bigint,
	[date] date,
	[year] bigint,
	[month] bigint,
	[day] bigint,
	[day_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[day_of_year] bigint,
	[week_of_month] bigint,
	[week_of_year] bigint,
	[month_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[year_month] bigint,
	[year_week] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'raw/calendar.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
	FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM bronze.calendar
GO

-- -- Create Calendar external table from calendar csv file
use nyc_taxi_ldw;
IF NOT EXISTS (select * from sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'trip_data_green_csv')
 
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_csv (
	[VendorID] bigint,
	[lpep_pickup_datetime] datetime2(0),
	[lpep_dropoff_datetime] datetime2(0),
	[store_and_fwd_flag] nvarchar(4000),
	[RatecodeID] bigint,
	[PULocationID] bigint,
	[DOLocationID] bigint,
	[passenger_count] bigint,
	[trip_distance] float,
	[fare_amount] float,
	[extra] float,
	[mta_tax] float,
	[tip_amount] float,
	[tolls_amount] float,
	[ehail_fee] nvarchar(4000),
	[improvement_surcharge] float,
	[total_amount] float,
	[payment_type] bigint,
	[trip_type] bigint,
	[congestion_surcharge] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'raw/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
	FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format
	)
GO

SELECT top 100  * FROM bronze.trip_data_green_csv
order by [lpep_pickup_datetime] DESC
GO


-- Create externa table vendor

use nyc_taxi_ldw;
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_file_format 
WITH (  
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
    FIELD_TERMINATOR ='\t',
   STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
   FIRST_ROW = 2,
   USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
  ENCODING ='UTF8',
  PARSER_VERSION = '2.0')

);

use nyc_taxi_ldw;
IF NOT EXISTS (select * from sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'bronze.trip_type')

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type (
	[trip_type] varchar(5),
	[trip_type_desc] varchar(100)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'raw/trip_type.tsv',
	DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
	FILE_FORMAT = tsv_file_format
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM bronze.trip_type;
GO


DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type

- 
-- create external file format for parquet file format

use nyc_taxi_ldw;
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'parquet_file_format')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_file_format
WITH (  
   FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
   DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);

-- Create external table for parquet format

use nyc_taxi_ldw;
--IF NOT EXISTS (select * from sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'trip_data')
 IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_data_green_parquet') IS NOT NULL
 DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_parquet;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_parquet (
	[VendorID] INT,
	[lpep_pickup_datetime] datetime2(7),
	[lpep_dropoff_datetime] datetime2(7),
	[store_and_fwd_flag] char(1),
	[RatecodeID] INT,
	[PULocationID] INT,
	[DOLocationID] INT,
	[passenger_count] INT,
	[trip_distance] float,
	[fare_amount] float,
	[extra] float,
	[mta_tax] float,
	[tip_amount] float,
	[tolls_amount] float,
	[ehail_fee] INT,
	[improvement_surcharge] float,
	[total_amount] float,
	[payment_type] INT,
	[trip_type] INT,
	[congestion_surcharge] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'raw/trip_data_green_parquet/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
	FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
	)
GO

SELECT  TOP 50 * FROM bronze.trip_data_green_parquet

GO


--CREATE DELTA FILE FORMAT
use nyc_taxi_ldw;
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'delta_file_format')
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delta_file_format
WITH (  
   FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA,
   DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
-- CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE USING DELTA PARQUET FILE
use nyc_taxi_ldw;

 IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_data_green_delta') IS NOT NULL
 DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_delta;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_delta (
	[VendorID] INT,
	[lpep_pickup_datetime] datetime2(7),
	[lpep_dropoff_datetime] datetime2(7),
	[store_and_fwd_flag] char(1),
	[RatecodeID] INT,
	[PULocationID] INT,
	[DOLocationID] INT,
	[passenger_count] INT,
	[trip_distance] float,
	[fare_amount] float,
	[extra] float,
	[mta_tax] float,
	[tip_amount] float,
	[tolls_amount] float,
	[ehail_fee] INT,
	[improvement_surcharge] float,
	[total_amount] float,
	[payment_type] INT,
	[trip_type] INT,
	[congestion_surcharge] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'raw/trip_data_green_delta/',
	DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
	FILE_FORMAT = delta_file_format
	)
GO

SELECT  TOP 50 * FROM bronze.trip_data_green_delta

GO
